price: 43. Mpe tosilaki kopesa Mûssa buku, o sima ya tango oyo tosilaki koboma bato ya liboso baye baleka, mpo ezala elembetele epai na bato, mpe ezala bokambi mpe ngolu тропа bato mpo ete bakanisa.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَا مُوسَى ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ مَآ أَهۡلَكۡنَا ٱلۡقُرُونَ ٱلۡأُولَىٰ بَصَآئِرَ لِلنَّاسِ وَهُدٗى وَرَحۡمَةٗ لَّعَلَّهُمۡ يَتَذَكَّرُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ātaynā mūsā al-kitāba min baʿdi mā ahlaknā al-qurūna al-ūlā baṣāira lilnnāsi wahudan waraḥmatan laʿallahum yatadhakkarūna
